title: Business Card, "Garda S. Karplus Hand Loomed Weaving"
medium: Letterpress and photo offset lithograph on brown textured and white wove paper, mounted on grey-blue wove paper

tombstone.epitaph:
Business Card, "Garda S. Karplus Hand Loomed Weaving".
Letterpress and photo offset lithograph on brown textured and white wove paper, mounted on grey-blue wove paper. Gift of James Howard Fraser. 2000-68-113.
